item.title: Is Meta’s stock in trouble? OpenAI’s new app has Wall Street worried.
item.description: OpenAI’s Sora app could fundamentally change the social-media landscape and leave Meta scrambling to catch up.

item.title: ‘She’s been moving money from his account’: My late father wrote a will before meeting his current wife. Who gets his money?
item.description: “He gave his fourth wife power of attorney and access to his bank account to pay bills.”

item.title: Is there such a thing as too much Taylor Swift? Not for Disney.

item.title: RBC sees upside of more than 40% ahead for specialty grocery store chain
item.description: A catch-up in sales of organic foods alongside new marketing efforts could provide catalysts to boost shares of Sprouts Farmers Market, RBC said.

item.title: Bloom Energy soars more than 20% on deal with Brookfield to put fuel cells in AI data centers

item.title: JPMorgan tells clients to buy Friday's stock market dip
item.description: Friday's big decline has JPMorgan traders telling clients to buy the dip, but not without protection.
